name: Solitaire 70+ Card Games in 1 Premium Version: Tripeaks, Klondike, Hearts, Pyramid, Plus More!
name_original: Solitaire 70+ Card Games in 1 Premium Version: Tripeaks, Klondike, Hearts, Pyramid, Plus More!
description:
Wow!! More than 70+ different Solitaire games all in one easy app. All your favorite classics; Klondike, Spider, Tri-Peaks, FreeCell, and much more! This app will give you enough Solitaire games to last you for the rest of your life!

Features include:
+ Ad FREE Deluxe Version
+ Preview hints
+ Autoplay
+ Unlimited undo
+ Smooth card animations
+ Drag and drop or simple select and move controls
+ Customize your colors
+ Timing and scoring modes
+ Supports all devices
+ Relax mode makes the game faster and easier to win
+ Great tutorials for each different game

It really doesn't get any better than having more than 70+ different games of solitaire to play! You will learn so many new and fun variations of this awesome classic card game!

The full list of Solitaire games includes; Acme, Alhambra, Alternations, Auld Lang Sync, Aunt Mary, Baker’s Game, Batsford, Beleaguered Castle, Blind Alleys, Blockade, Brigade, Busy Aces, Canfield, Capricieuse, Carlton, Carpet, Castles in Spain, Congress, Corona, Courtyard, Diplomat, Double Klondike, Double Rail, East Haven, Eight Off, Fan, Flower Garden, Fortress, Fortunes Favor, Forty and Eight, Forty-Nine, Forty Thieves, Freecell, Gargantua, Giant, King Albert, Kingdom, Klondike, Klondike - by threes, Lady Palk, Legion, Limited, Lucas, Maria, Martha, Midshipman, Milligan Harp, Napoleon’s Exile, Number Ten, Octagon, Raglan, Red and Black, Royal Aids, Russian Solitaire, Scotch Patience, Single Rail, Somerset, Spider, Spider - One Suit, Spider - Two Suits, Squadron, Steps, Stonewall, Streets, Streets and Alleys, Tam O’Shanter, Thirty-Six, Tri-Peaks, Triple Line, Waning Moon, Westcliff, Whitehead, Yukon

Don't pass up this opportunity to have all of these solitaire games today! Download and enjoy :) Thanks for playing!
